Description: Provide immediate visual feedback when buttons are pressed
Do: Scale down slightly on active state + color shift
Don't: No visual change on button press

Description: Smooth color/opacity transitions on hover for interactive elements
Do: Use transition-colors duration-200 ease
Don't: Instant color changes without transition

Description: Animate toggle switches between states with smooth sliding
Do: Smooth slide with spring-like easing + color change
Don't: Instant state change without animation

Description: Highlight input fields on focus with glowing border effect
Do: Use box-shadow with primary color at low opacity
Don't: Only change border-color without glow

Description: Material-style ripple effect on touch/click targets
Do: Use CSS pseudo-element or library for ripple spreading outward
Don't: Heavy JS-based ripple that blocks main thread

Description: Show content-shaped placeholders while data loads
Do: Match exact layout shape of loaded content + pulse animation
Don't: Generic spinner for content-heavy pages

Description: Show determinate progress for known-length operations
Do: Use thin bar at top of page + percentage indication
Don't: Indeterminate spinner for operations with known progress

Description: Rotating indicator for short indeterminate waits (<3s)
Do: Use lightweight CSS spinner with consistent sizing
Don't: Complex lottie animation for simple loading
CSS_Example: .spinner { animation: spin 1s linear infinite; border: 3px solid; border-top-color: transparent; }

Description: Fade content in after loading completes
Do: Stagger children with increasing delay for natural feel
Don't: All content appearing at once without transition
CSS_Example: .item { animation: fadeIn 300ms ease forwards; animation-delay: calc(var(--i) * 50ms); }

Description: Pull-down gesture to refresh content on mobile
Do: Show progress indicator during pull + snap-back animation
Don't: Refresh without visual feedback
CSS_Example: Container with overscroll-behavior and custom indicator

Description: Animate between page/route changes
Do: Use shared element transitions where possible + 200-400ms duration
Don't: No transition between pages or >500ms transitions

Description: Animate modal appearance and dismissal
Do: Fade overlay + scale-up content from center
Don't: Instant appear/disappear of modals
CSS_Example: .modal { animation: scaleIn 200ms ease; } @keyframes scaleIn { from { transform: scale(0.95); opacity: 0; } }

Description: Slide-in panels from edge of screen
Do: Translate from off-screen edge + fade backdrop
Don't: Jump-cut appearance of side panels

Description: Smooth height animation for expandable content
Do: Use grid-template-rows: 0fr → 1fr for smooth height or max-height transition
Don't: display:none toggling without transition

Description: Animate toast entry/exit from edge of screen
Do: Slide in from edge + auto-dismiss with progress bar
Don't: Toasts that appear without animation or block interaction
CSS_Example: .toast { animation: slideInRight 300ms ease translateX(100%) to translateX(0); }

Description: Reveal elements as they enter the viewport
Do: Use IntersectionObserver + CSS animation classes
Don't: Heavy scroll event listeners for animations

Description: Create depth illusion with different scroll speeds
Do: Use transform: translateZ() with perspective or scroll-timeline
Don't: JavaScript-based parallax that causes jank

Description: Shrink header height on scroll for more content space
Do: Smooth height transition + reduce padding on scroll
Don't: Instant height change or content jump

Description: Show reading/scroll progress at top of page
Do: Thin bar at top that fills based on scroll position
Don't: Chunky progress bar that takes too much space

Description: Load more content as user scrolls to bottom
Do: Show loading indicator at bottom + intersection observer trigger
Don't: Load all data at once or no loading indicator
CSS_Example: IntersectionObserver on sentinel element at bottom

Description: Animate success state after action completion
Do: Checkmark drawing animation + green color flash
Don't: Plain text "Success" without visual confirmation

Description: Shake element to indicate error/invalid input
Do: Subtle horizontal shake (3-5px range) + red border
Don't: Aggressive shaking or only color change

Description: Confirm successful copy action with brief animation
Do: Tooltip saying "Copied!" + icon change for 2s
Don't: No feedback after copy action

Description: Draw attention to important elements or notifications
Do: Gentle pulse with low opacity glow on badges/alerts
Don't: Constant aggressive pulsing that causes distraction
CSS_Example: .badge { animation: pulse 2s infinite; } @keyframes pulse { 50% { box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(239 68 68 / 0.4); } }

Description: Bounce animation to draw attention to CTA buttons
Do: Single bounce on load + stop (not continuous)
Don't: Continuous bouncing that is distracting

Description: Respect user motion preferences
Do: Use prefers-reduced-motion media query to disable animations
Don't: Ignoring user motion preferences

Description: Use GPU-accelerated properties for smooth animations
Do: Animate transform and opacity only. Use will-change sparingly
Don't: Animating width height top left margin

Description: Use appropriate animation durations for different contexts
Do: 100-200ms for micro-interactions Á 300-500ms for emphasis
Don't: Animations longer than 500ms for UI feedback or <100ms (imperceptible)

Description: Use requestAnimationFrame for JS animations
Do: rAF for smooth 60fps JS animations
Don't: setInterval or setTimeout for animations

Description: Animate transition from loading to content state
Do: Cross-fade skeleton to real content + maintain layout dimensions
Don't: Content popping in with layout shift
CSS_Example: .content { animation: fadeIn 200ms ease; } .skeleton { animation: fadeOut 200ms ease; }
